messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/7/03 8:32:46 PM, starsuncloud@netzero.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/7/03 8:32:46 PM, starsuncloud@... writes:

<< We stayed with the Lovejoys for a couple of nights and felt completely at
ease, welcomed and all filled up with joy when we left. >>

Though I did miss the conference, luckily Marty and I didn't miss getting to
stay at Kelly's house.

It's a shame that some people spend their time trying to help other families
be more at peace and live in more freedom, and then once in a while someone
feels compelled to spend some of THEIR time undermining that. It's not worth
doing, really.

Sandra
